com.google.bitcoin.store

Class WalletExtensionSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.bitcoin.store.WalletExtensionSerializer

  • public class WalletExtensionSerializer
extends Object
    Optional helper for WalletProtobufSerializer that allows for serialization and deserialization of Wallet objects with extensions and corresponding extended Wallet classes. If you want to store proprietary data into the wallet, this is how to do it.
